Replace.Text: Dolly is willing to provide you with
Because of your talent, Dolly is willing to reduce your loan by 20%[ICON_GOLD][NewLine] "additional investment!"
Because of your talent, Dolly is willing to deduct 40% of your [ICON_GOLD] loan [NewLine] "Franchise!"
Because of your talent, Dolly is willing to reduce your loan by 60%[ICON_GOLD][NewLine] "Of course I'm at a loss. I'm going to go out and ride a pack beast!"
Because of your talent, Dolly is willing to reduce your loan by 80%[ICON_GOLD][NewLine] "I'm not interested in Mora~"
Because of your talent, Dolly is willing to reduce your 100% [ICON_GOLD] loan [NewLine] "For ideal..."
Closed, Dolly is willing to ease the loan for you, double the loan amount
Outstanding, Dolly has decided to limit your spending and cut the loan amount in half
"Do the right thing, even if it costs you all."

After completing technology and building walls, you will get the characteristic unit Mehrak, and you will get 1/2/5 "Inspiration" when you complete the building, area, and wonder respectively. You can consume "Inspiration" through Mehrak to gain research progress and provide the nearest city with [ ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity [NewLine] can borrow from Dolly. Initially, you will bear 400 [ICON_GOLD] loan and get 200 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins. When the era changes, you will be asked to repay [NewLine] After using Mehrak to consume "Inspiration", Dolly will forgive part of the loan for you (the standard for each reduction amount is - Miaolun Scholar level Ã— 5)
Sumeru, a famous architect, is overly concerned about too many things. Aesthetes, troubled by reality. [NewLine] "Do the right thing, even if it costs you all."
